description:
The Collaboration Platform for API Development

Postman is a collaboration platform for API development. Postman's features simplify each step of building an API and streamline collaboration so you can create better APIs — faster.
What’s New
- We’ve added a new admin-only setting: Disable creating public mock servers. When selected, it prevents team members from creating public mock servers. This setting can be accessed at Team settings > Team resources > Mock servers. Learn more
Improvements
- We've made some minor enhancements and bug fixes in this release.
Check out this month’s Postman Drop for practical tips on improving API quality, like using the Postman VS Code extension or sharing responses in Slack. Explore the Drop to see how these updates can enhance your workflows.
